featured.text: Some waste from nuclear power plants is buried in ________ containers.
In a plastic container in a damp cellar. (B) In a clear glass bottle near the kitchen stove.

definition.zh_def: 容器，通常用來儲存或運輸物品的物品。
definition.en_def: A receptacle used for holding or transporting items.
definition.example: She placed the cookies in a plastic container.
